title: Buckellacris nuda
text:
Buckellacris nuda, or Buckell's timberline grasshopper, is a species of <a href="Melanoplinae">spur-throated grasshopper</a> in the family <a href="Acrididae">Acrididae</a>. It is found in North America.
Subspecies.
These two subspecies belong to the species "Buckellacris nuda":
